value:
Everything Lord Gharnef desires...
Everything as he commands...

Eradicate the filth of this world...
Yes, I understand my orders.

It would be good if my master could
also have the clerics of Askr as well.

My children are troublesome trash...
However, even trash can be put
to proper use.

The brighter a light shines, the
deeper darkness becomes...
I tried my best...for the children.

I was asked to visit your castle...
No... I was not ordered to assassinate
you by $Nf yet.

Ugly filth that walk the world...
Fear me.

I...have no excuse. I have
betrayed your expectations...

Yes, yes. I understand. Henceforth
I will demonstrate how I can set
a good example.

I am Eremiya. Ehehe... It goes without
saying, but I shall carry out my duty
as you wish.

Abandoned children... Such
meaningless trash. And who was it
that saved discarded trash like that?$k$pIt was I... Through the guidance of
Lord Gharnef...$k$pShrouded in darkness at the bottom
of the deep Abyss... My children grew
to become strong and proper "dolls."$k$pHow about I give you a taste of fear
deserved by wicked adults? Let this
ugly world wallow in eternal despair!$k$pAnd you, standing before me... You
too will become one of my many
children, $Nu.
*laughs* Until you break, my little doll...I'll find a use for you.
Katarina? Oh, you mean Reese. Perhaps a more fitting name for her would be "traitor."
All those children died... They died...
You're such a sweet child, and I will make use of you. In fact, I'll use you until there's nothing left.
